subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon passed Hélio Castroneves coming off the final turn on the one-and-a-half-mile oval at Kentucky Speedway to win the Meijer Indy 300 in Sparta, Ky. The victory was Dixon’s second in a row and sixth of the season. He is closing in on his second IndyCar Series championship.
